DOC.brief_summary: Persistent insomnia is highly prevalent complaint in cancer survivors, but is seldom satisfactorily addressed. The adaptation to cancer care of a validated, cost-effective intervention may offer a practicable solution. The aim of this study was to investigate the clinical effectiveness of homeopathy for insomnia.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Homeopathy for Persistent Insomnia in Patients With Cancer
